## TogglePattern

### TogglePattern Globally
```
Globally, it is always the case that if "Q" holds then "R" toggles "S"
```
```
Counterexample: true;⌈(Q && R)⌉;⌈!R⌉;⌈(!R && !S)⌉;true
```
